verses.name: Micah 3:9
verses.text: Hear this, I pray you, ye heads of the house of Jacob, and princes of the house of Israel, that abhor judgment, and pervert all equity.

verses.name: Micah 3:10
verses.text: They build up Zion with blood, and Jerusalem with iniquity.

verses.name: Micah 3:11
verses.text: The heads thereof judge for reward, and the priests thereof teach for hire, and the prophets thereof divine for money: yet will they lean upon the Lord, and say, Is not the Lord among us? none evil can come upon us.
